short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Guaranteed to widen your web pages by a factor of 19.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever liked to widen images on your iPhone mobile phone or Android device with the famous revolutionary app "Wide19"? Well, introducing the same app except this time it's for your browser and it'll widen your websites instead of images.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Odxj8YELfQ
Android app: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.justMe.wide19
iOS app: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/wide19/id1479315462
